roleset.name: underestimate, perceiving something as having lower value than it actually has

example.name: ARG0 and ARG2 and ARG1
example.text: John Wetherell , a Lloyd 's underwriter , says he and his fellow underwriters underestimated by as much as 50 % the premiums they should have charged for property risks from 1980 to 1985 .
example.arg: the premiums they should have charged for property risks from 1980 to 1985

example.name: missing extent
example.text: I had underestimated, however, both Mr. Gelbart's wit and the persistence of scandal in Washington.
example.arg: both Mr. Gelbart's wit and the persistence of scandal in Washington.

example.name: missing agent
example.text: In other words, the growth rates of both total GNP and real private business product per labor hour have been underestimated [*]by about 20%.
example.arg: the growth rates of both total GNP and real private business product per labor hour

example.name: missing agent and EXT
example.text: But while verbal high jinks alone won't help PASOK regain power, Mr. Papandreou should never be underestimated [*].

roleset.note: UNDERESTIMATE-V NOTES: No Verbnet entry. (from underestimate.01-v)
